name: Redmi 13C 5G (Startrail Green, 4GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | MediaTek Dimensity 6100+ 5G | 90Hz Display
description: With India becoming the 2(nd) largest 5G ecosystem in the world, we at Xiaomi are pulling no punches when it comes to bringing 5G to everyone. A result of this relentless pursuit is the Redmi 13C 5G, a smartphone made for India, made in India. Redmi 13C 5G brings superfast internet speeds with support for all 5G network providers so that you can access 5G across the entire country. Powered by the latest 5G MediaTek Dimensity 6100+ octa-core processor, Redmi 13C 5G is fast, smooth and reliable. Be it watching videos on YouTube or playing multiplayer online games like BGMI, you’ll never fall behind. The big 17.1cm(6.74) HD+ 90Hz display ensures every video you watch and every game you play is immersive and smooth. With up to 16GB* RAM you can play all your games without breaking a sweat and worrying about the smoothness of your phone. Up to superfast 256GB UFS 2.2 storage ensures that you can carry all your favourite downloaded content wherever you go, and you can even expand the storage up to 1TB with a microSD card. While it’s powerful inside, Redmi 13C 5G is beautiful outside. With its unique star trail design, you’re bound to turn heads wherever you go. The Star Trail Design is meticulously created. Coming in three colours, Redmi 13C 5G makes you stand out, and stand tall. Special care has been taken to make your Redmi 13C 5G robust so that no matter where you are, you don’t have to worry about damage from water or dust, and the Corning Gorilla Glass on the front protects the display from accidental scratches. The 50MP AI Dual Camera ensures your portraits and scenery shots are memory-perfect. With 7 new Classic Film Filters, add that vintage and cool vibe to all your photos. Its 5000mAh(typ) battery with 18W fast charging (10W fast charger in-box) will ensure you never run out of juice, and all your data is safe and protected by the quick unlock fingerprint scanner.

battery.videoPlaybackTime: Up to 23 hours of video streaming

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G (Green, 12GB, 256GB Storage)
description: CAPTURE THE NIGHT IN LOW LIGHT: Whether you’re headed to a concert or romantic night out, there’s no such thing as bad lighting with Night Mode; Galaxy S23 Ultra lets you capture epic content in any setting with stunning Nightography. HIGHEST PHONE CAMERA RESOLUTION: Create crystal-clear content worth sharing with Galaxy S23 Ultra’s 200MP camera — the highest camera resolution on a phone; Whether you’re posting or printing, Galaxy S23 Ultra always does the moment justice. STUNNINGLY SMOOTH VIDEO: Capture incredibly smooth video during life’s most exciting moments; With Video Stabilization, this smartphone easily records daytime outdoor adventures or those spur-of-the-moment dance parties at night. WRITE, DRAW, CREATE w/ S PEN: Whether you’re in Samsung Note, Microsoft Office or Google Suite, with the built-in S Pen, you can convert handwriting to text, share your creations live and keep everything on your Galaxy S23 Ultra device. SNAP PICS w/ S PEN: Capture epic selfies and beautiful photos with the click of your S Pen; Simply open up the camera app and click the button on the S Pen instead of the screen; Getting that great shot just got easier. And with 5G connectivity, you can experience blazing-fast download and upload speeds wherever you go. With its premium design, powerful performance, and advanced features, the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is the ultimate smartphone for discerning users.  Plus, with advanced AI features like scene optimization and object tracking, your shots will always look their best. Stay connected and productive all day long with the Galaxy S23 Ultra's long-lasting battery life and fast charging capabilities. Get a smartphone for yourself that can detect your moods and react appropriately. The Samsung Galaxy Ultra's potent processor and advanced camera sensor can handle low light and noise reduction. The phone's Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, which also provides a long battery life to carry you through even the busiest days, also enables quick gaming and video streaming. You can also launch Expert RAW to take high-resolution RAW photos that are vivid and packed with information. Moreover, Dynamic AMOLED 2X offers clear, brilliant details in both bright and low-light conditions. Additionally, to smooth up gaming and save power, the refresh rate is automatically optimised with 120 Hz technology.

battery.videoPlaybackTime: Up to 20 hours of video streaming

name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max (256 GB) - Black Titanium
description: FORGED IN TITANIUM — iPhone 15 Pro Max has a strong and light aerospace-grade titanium design with a textured matte-glass back. It also features a Ceramic Shield front that’s tougher than any smartphone glass. And it’s splash, water, and dust resistant. ADVANCED DISPLAY — The 6.7” Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion ramps up refresh rates to 120Hz when you need exceptional graphics performance. Dynamic Island bubbles up alerts and Live Notifications. Plus, with Always-On display, your Lock Screen stays glanceable, so you don’t have to tap it to stay in the know. GAME-CHANGING A17 PRO CHIP — A Pro-class GPU makes mobile games feel so immersive, with rich environments and realistic characters. A17 Pro is also incredibly efficient and helps to deliver amazing all-day battery life. POWERFUL PRO CAMERA SYSTEM — Get incredible framing flexibility with 7 pro lenses. Capture super high-resolution photos with more color and detail using the 48MP Main camera. And take sharper close-ups from farther away with the 5x Telephoto camera on iPhone 15 Pro Max.CUSTOMIZABLE ACTION BUTTON — Action button is a fast track to your favorite feature. Just set the one you want, like Silent mode, Camera, Voice Memo, Shortcut, and more. Then press and hold to launch the action. USB-C with USB3 -  upto 20x faster transfers. Splash, Water, and Dust Resistant

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro 5G (Stromy Black, 12GB RAM, 128GB Storage)
description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is a flagship smartphone that combines cutting-edge technology with sleek design. Powered by Google's Tensor chip, the Pixel 6 Pro delivers lightning-fast performance and AI-enhanced features. Its 6.7-inch QHD+ LTPO OLED display offers vibrant colors and deep blacks, perfect for watching movies or playing games. With a versatile triple-camera system, including a 50MP main camera, 12MP ultra-wide camera, and 48MP telephoto camera, the Pixel 6 Pro lets you capture stunning photos and videos in any situation. Plus, with features like Night Sight and Super Res Zoom, you can take professional-quality shots with ease. Stay connected all day long with the Pixel 6 Pro's long-lasting battery life and fast charging capabilities. And with Android 12, you get the latest features and security updates from Google. Experience the best of Google with the Pixel 6 Pro.

Its 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display with QHD+ resolution offers stunning visuals with vibrant colors and deep blacks. Whether you're gaming, streaming videos, or browsing the web, the OnePlus 10 Pro provides an immersive experience like no other. Capture every moment in stunning detail with its versatile quad-camera system, featuring a 48MP main camera, 50MP ultra-wide camera, 8MP telephoto camera, and 2MP monochrome camera. With advanced features like Nightscape, UltraShot HDR, and Super Macro, you can take professional-quality photos and videos in any lighting condition. Plus, with its Warp Charge 80T technology, you can recharge your device from 0 to 100% in just 30 minutes. Experience the best of OnePlus with the OnePlus 10 Pro.
